Field.Name: _SPTranslatedLanguages
Field.Description: Languages that this item has been or is being translated into

Field.Name: _SPTranslationSourceItemId
Field.Description: Unique ID of the item this translation is based on

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Form Templates
pnp:ListInstance.Description: This library contains administrator-approved form templates that were activated to this site collection.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Site Assets
pnp:ListInstance.Description: Use this library to store files which are included on pages within this site, such as images on Wiki pages.

pnp:ListInstance.Title: Style Library
pnp:ListInstance.Description: Use the style library to store style sheets, such as CSS or XSL files. The style sheets in this gallery can be used by this site or any of its subsites.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: This is a text web part in a one column section. You can click inside this text block when in Edit mode to make changes. Besides being able to change the text, you can use the toolbar to choose styles, make other format changes, and add links. You can even add a table by clicking the ellipses (…) in the toolbar for more options.

pnp:CanvasControlProperty.Value: Cette section comprend du texte affiché dans une colonne. Pour effectuer des changements, vous devez passer en mode Modifier et cliquer dans cette zone de texte. Vous pouvez utiliser la barre d’outils pour choisir des styles, changer de format et ajouter des liens. Pour ajouter un tableau, vous n’avez qu’à cliquer sur les points de suspension (…) dans la barre d’outils pour voir plus d’options.
